## ğŸ¯ GENESIS LAUNCH SEQUENCE

```bash
# Execute these commands in order:

# 1. Register domain (manual)
echo "Register guardianshield.io at Cloudflare/Namecheap"

# 2. Deploy server (manual)
echo "Create Ubuntu 22.04 droplet at DigitalOcean"

# 3. Automated deployment (2-3 hours)
git clone https://github.com/Rexjaden/guardianshield-agents
cd guardianshield-agents
chmod +x deploy_guardian_shield.sh
sudo ./deploy_guardian_shield.sh guardianshield.io

# 4. DNS configuration (manual - 5 minutes)
echo "Add DNS records from godaddy_dns_config.json"

# 5. SSL certificate (automatic)
echo "Let's Encrypt will auto-configure SSL"

# 6. Service verification (automatic)
echo "All services will be health-checked automatically"
```
